definition: its place/one's appointed place/the place for that
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
each in the correct place/each is provided for
to adapt to sb's taste/to fit sb's fancy
to know that it is so but not why it is so (idiom)
pinyin: zhi1 qi2 ran2 er2 bu4 zhi1 qi2 suo3 yi3 ran2
containing_words.word: 知其然而不知其所以然

definition: see 忘乎所以[wang4 hu1 suo3 yi3]
as one pleases (idiom)
used properly/used for its intended purpose/to put to good use/to serve its purpose
exactly what one would wish/to find one's niche
to pander to sb's whims

sentences.english: But there is much uncertainty about what it will involve.
sentences.chinese: 但是其所涉及的內容具有很多不確定性。

sentences.english: Enterprise architects are challenged by the vast amount of complexity they face.
sentences.chinese: 企業架構師正受到其所面臨的大量複雜性的挑戰。

sentences.english: The extent and consequences of the harm often more serious than the dam break.
sentences.chinese: 其所造成危害程度和後果比水庫潰壩嚴重。

sentences.english: An adjective must agree with its noun in mumber and case.
sentences.chinese: 形容詞在數和格方面必須符合其所修飾的名詞。

sentences.english: Only then will she cite the reasons she supports the favored (discriminatory) policy.
sentences.chinese: 只有當她支持其所受惠的政策時她才提及原因。

sentences.english: Endoscope, for example a colonoscope, and a cleaning method for use therewith.
sentences.chinese: 內窺鏡，例如結腸鏡，以及其所採用的清洗方法。

sentences.english: The main pollutant emitted from open sources is resuspended dust.
sentences.chinese: 其所排放的主要污染物是揚塵。

sentences.english: The concluding paragraph ends with the expected outcome or suggested action to be taken.
sentences.chinese: 尾段表達其所希望的結論或建議所應採取之行動。

sentences.english: In order to access your CD-ROM drive, please enter the device file that should be used.
sentences.chinese: 爲了能夠存取您的光碟機，請輸入其所對應的裝置檔。

sentences.english: The drawing itself must take on the quality of the sought-for object.
sentences.chinese: 繪圖自身必須呈現其所追求的目標的品質。

sentences.english: However, the Bank shall not engage in any actions applied for prior to the expiry of such specified period.
sentences.chinese: 但不得於申請後之等候時間內，進行其所申請之事項。

sentences.english: An adjective must agree with  its noun in mumber and case.
sentences.chinese: 形容詞在數和格方面必須符合其所修飾的名詞。

sentences.english: The book’s main shortcoming, however, is in what it overlooks.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這本書的主要缺點卻在於其所忽視的部分。

sentences.english: The hole in many marketing programs is the lack of holism.
sentences.chinese: 許多營銷項目的突破口，正在於其所缺少的全局觀念。

sentences.english: The influence of power depends on the capital or resource it control.
sentences.chinese: 它的作用的發揮依賴於其所掌握的資本或資源。

definition: his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
(conjunction linking two nouns) and its .../and their .../and his .../and her ...
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
also
(possessive particle, literary equivalent of 的[de5])/him/her/it
happening/instance/reason/cause/intentional/former/old/friend/therefore/hence/(of people) to die, dead
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
aforementioned/above-mentioned
itself/oneself/one's own
both/both of them/neither
variant of 凡[fan2]
to state/to tell/to narrate/to relate

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
the former
equal to/having the same social class or status
